column2:
ss %>% select(date, GPP_C, discharge, R, C, HR_p, HR_d, AR, litter )%>%
pivot_longer( -date, names_to = 'var', values_to = 'value') %>%
  ggplot(aes(date, value, col = var)) +
  geom_line()+
  facet_wrap(.~var, scales = 'free_y', ncol = 2)
